page.title: 01In and around Springburn
page.content: As the population of Glasgow grew many lived in Springburn.Hundreds worked in the locomotive industry.Springburn was synonymous with railways.Industrial, commercial and residential building extended north and east.As the railway and other industries declined so did the population.Derelict areas showed where people lived and worked.Recently older houses have been modernised, amenities improved,ground landscaped, some industrial estates built nearby. {Page number:- 11 }Landscape { 2} Education {12} Law and Order { 3} Government {13} Life Styles { 4 }Health {14} Recreation { 5 }Health {15} Recreation { 6 }Home Life {16} Recreation { 7 }Home Life {17} Recreation { 8 }Home Life {18} Religion { 9 }Home Life {19} Trade {10 }Industry {20} Trade
